content.query:
select 
 1 as SourceID,
'UUID'  as CatalogID,
c.ActorID,
c.name as Actor,
 a.availabilitydate  as ReleaseDate,
a.Genre,
a.Rating,
cast(ReleaseYear as int) as  AvailabilityYear,
a.StreamingAvailabilityDate as AvailabilityDate,
a.Tier  as MovieTier, 
a.Title as MovieTitle, 
b.MovieID
 
 from stg.movies_cosmosdb a
 join (select ROW_NUMBER() over (order by title)  MovieID , title 
        from stg.movies_cosmosdb
        )  b on a.title=b.title
 join (
     select name, title, DENSE_RANK() over(order by name) as ActorID
  from stg.Cosmos_Actors
   
  )   c on c.title=a.title
